EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #14.2018 Dealer Update #14
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Updates - Special Promotion for Aspire 200
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | August 2018
$60K Discount on Aspire 200 for Helicopters
- This sales bulletin announces a special promotional price for the Aspire 200 satellite communications system for helicopters. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-05 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-05 Rev A Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters Promotion.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Aspire 200 Available for Fixed Wing Aircraft
- This sales bulletin lists catalog pricing and STC information for the Aspire 200 satellite communications system for fixed wing aircraft.
- Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-34 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-34 Aspire 200 with HDR for Fixed Wing Aircraft.pdf]]>
- Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Airborne Flight Information System Data Management Unit Frequency Change for SITA North America
- This sales bulletin outlines changes to the upgrade path and clarifies pricing for hardware and software upgrades.
- Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-31 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-31 Rev A AFIS DMU Sita Change.pdf]]>
- Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
